Instructions: Thank you for contacting us. As part of our continued efforts to stop underage smoking, we verify that every smoker on our mailing list is 21 years or older. In order to be added to the active mailing list and be eligible to receive future mailings, please complete the form with your name, current address, and date of birth. If you have any questions, call 1-800-777-2695.
Instructions2: Send form and copy of ID in the enclosed self-addressed envelope to Attn: Consumer Relations, PO. Box 2959, Winston-Salem, NC 27102
Offer: Restricted to Smokers 21 Years of Age or Older. We respect the privacy of our smokers and do not sell the names on our lists to anyone.
